definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: bar (cf. As. burûḫu, spearshaft, spear, COT:Gloss)—[[בְּרִיחַ]] De 3:5 = 11 t. (cstr. Am 1:5 etc.); [[בְּרִיחוֹ]] Ex 35:11, Ex 39:38 Kt (Qr both [[־חַיו]] needless); pl. [[בְּרִיחִם]] Ex 26:26 + 8 t., [[בְּרִיחִים]] 2Ch 14:6, [[בְּרִיחֵי]] Ex 36:31 + 3 t., [[בְּרִיחָָיִח]] Na 3:13, [[בְּרִיחָיו]] Ex 40:18 + 7 t. (+ Qr Ex 35:11, Ex 39:33), [[בְּרִיחֶיהָ]] Je 51:30, La 2:9, [[בְּרִחֶיהָ]] Jon 2:7, [[בְּרִיחֶָהָ]] Is 15:5 but cf. infr.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: bar, of wood, joining boards of tabern. Ex 26:26, Ex 26:27, Ex 26:27, Ex 26:28, Ex 26:29, Ex 26:29, Ex 35:11, Ex 36:31, Ex 36:32, Ex 36:32, Ex 36:33, Ex 36:34, Ex 36:34, Ex 40:18, Nu 3:36, Nu 4:31 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: bar (s) of city-gates De 3:5, Ju Jdg 16:8, 1Sa 23:7, 2Ch 8:5, 2Ch 14:6; id. of gates of Jerusalem La 2:9; also (‖[[מנעולים]]) Ne 3:3, Ne 3:6, Ne 3:18, Ne 3:14, Ne 3:15 cf. Ps 147:13; cf. Am 1:5, Na 3:13, Je 49:31, Ez Eze 38:11, Je 51:30; bars of city-gates, [[נחשׁת]] ´[[ב]] 1Ki 4:13, [[ברזל]] ´[[ב]] Is 45:2 (of Babylon, broken bef. Cyrus); [[בְּרִיחֶָהָ]] Is 15:5 rd. prob. c. Targum Di al. ´[[בָּר]] v. [[בָּרִיחַ]]; yet cf. Che's crit. n.

fig. [[בַּרְזׇל]] ´[[ב]] of distress, etc. Ps 107:16; of fortress, [[אַרְמוֹן]] ´[[ב]] in simile Pr 18:19; fig. ´[[ב]] of earth (pictured as house out of which Jonah is shut) Jon 2:7. (Older usage sg. of bar of door or gate, i.e. the great bar across the gate; so De 3:5, Ju Jdg 16:3, Am 1:5, 1Sa 23:7, 1Ki 4:13, Je 49:31, Pr 18:9, Job 38:10, 2Ch 8:5, Ez Eze 38:11 Later pl. Is 45:2, La 2:9, 2Ch 14:6, Ne 3:3, Ne 3:6, Ne 3:13, Ne 3:14, Ne 3:15, Ps 147:13, but also Na 3:13.)
